attributes.action: Legislate for the accurate recording of bio-sex of rape & other sexual offences.
attributes.additional_details:
1) Rape is rightly defined in law as a unique crime of male genitalia.
2) MOJ sexual offender statistics of at least 2 decades, 2002-2020, show that more than 99% of all sexual offenders* are MALE.
2b) MOJ Transgender SO statistics 2016-2019 already suggest "regardless of gender identity", with a notable absence of sexually offending transmen (transgender females).
3) ONS 2018 show 88-90% of those 'sexually offended against' are FEMALE (ONS 2018).
Parliament is Sovereign,NGOs are not lawmakers.
attributes.background: Legislate for accurate recording of biological sex of all investigated, charged, convicted, imprisoned for crimes of rape, attempted rape & all other sexual offences (in all 3 jurisdictions of UK). Statistical distortion apart, there is the medical harm to those sexually offended against 88% female.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  The UK Government are not responsible for policing in Scotland. 

We could accept a petition calling for the police to be required to record biological sex of offenders in England and Wales, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
